#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define mod 1000000007
ll power(ll a,ll b)
{
	if(b==0)
		return 1;
	if(b==1)
		return a;
	ll temp=power(a,b/2);
	temp=(temp*temp)%mod;
	if(b&1)
		temp=(temp*a)%mod;
	return temp;
}
int main()
{
 ll t,n,k,i,ans1,cal,ans2,res,temp,c,j;
 int d[10]={4,25,168,1229,9592,78498,664579,5761455,50847534};
 scanf("%lld",&t);
 while(t--)
 {
 	scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&k);
 	cal=n-k;
 	ans1=9;
 	if(cal%2)
 		cal++;
 	ans1=(ans1*power(10,cal/2-1))%mod;
 	ans2=d[k-1];
 	res=(ans1*ans2)%mod;
 	printf("%lld\n",res);
 	
 }
	return 0;
}
